summary:
Humans are highly intelligent primates, the only surviving species of the genus *Homo*. They are known for their large brains, upright walking, and complex social structures. With a population of over eight billion, humans are social and curious, creating diverse cultures, languages, and technologies.

Modern humans originated in Africa around 300,000 years ago and spread globally. They have a significant impact on the environment as apex predators. Humans are unique in their ability to adapt, invent, and modify their surroundings, but their activities also contribute to environmental issues.
title: Human
